UserWait.Message: This recipe will perform an indexed paired end sequencing run (including read 2 resynthesis) and place the data into a single run folder.

Indexing reagents must be loaded onto the PEM prior to the start of Read 1 sequencing. First, to check correct operation of the PEM, please load water onto positions #19, #21 and #22. Place PEM waste tube into a 15 ml falcon tube.
Priming complete. Check the waste tube. Click OK if the volume dispensed is 2.6 ml's and proceed to the next step. Otherwise, click Cancel and seek assistance before proceeding further
Please load indexing reagents onto positions #19, #21 and #22. Place PEM waste tube into a 15 ml falcon tube.
Priming complete. Check the waste tube. Click OK if the volume dispensed is 2.6 ml's and proceed to the next step. Otherwise, click Cancel and seek assistance before proceeding further

Please verify that you have correctly specified the number of cycles, configured RTA, and ensured you have adequate storage space in the run folder for a run of that length. Click OK to continue, or CANCEL to stop.
Read 1 First Base Incorporation Chemistry Complete. Click OK to continue, or CANCEL to Stop.
Please Evaluate the First Base Report Data For Read 1. Click OK to Proceed to First Cycle Imaging, or CANCEL to Stop.
Read 1 SBS Complete.

To check correct operation of the PEM priming pump, place PEM waste tube into a 15 ml falcon tube. Load water onto the Paired End Module (Positions #10, #11, #12, #13, #14, #15, #16, #19, #21. Click OK to Continue.
Priming complete. Check the waste tube. Click OK if the volume dispensed is 6.3 ml's and proceed to the next step. Otherwise, click Cancel and seek assistance before proceeding further
Load Read 2 Resynthesis Reagents onto the Paired End Module (RMX-#10, LMX2-#11, BMX-#12, AMX2-#13, APM2-#14, AT2-#15, HP2-#16, Dil HP3-#19, HT2-#21. Click OK to Continue.
Priming complete. Check the waste tube. Click OK if the volume dispensed is 6.3 ml's and proceed to the next step. Otherwise, click Cancel and seek assistance before proceeding further
You are about to run a pump test to check correct flow from PEM to GA by flowing wash buffer across the flowcell. Place GA waste tubes in a 15 ml falcon tube. Press OK to continue
Check the waste tube. Click OK if the volume dispensed is 2 ml. Otherwise, click Cancel and seek assistance before proceeding further
Place all waste lines back in waste bottle and click OK to Start PE Read 2 Preparation on the PE Module
Resynthesis complete. Load water onto the Paired End Module (Positions #10, #11, #12, #13, #14, #15, #16, #19, #21 and #22. Click OK to Continue.
Load Read 2 SBS reagents onto the GA. Click OK to Continue.
Read 2 First Base Incorporation Chemistry Complete. Click OK to continue, or CANCEL to Stop.
Please Evaluate the First Base Report Data For Read 2. Click OK to Proceed to Imaging, or CANCEL to Stop.
